name: Barbecue Beef Loaves
author: Shirley Drury
instructions: Place all ingredients in medium size mixing bowl. Mix well. Form into individual loaves and place in 8 4 x 6 4 x 2 inch baking dish. Bake in oven at 350Â° for 20 minutes. While loaves are baking, prepare sauce according to directions. After 20 minutes, spoon over loaves and bake 30 minutes longer.
